subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Damian Lillard, who has started every Portland game since being drafted in 2012, is slated to participate in multiple All-Star events and may be included on the United States national team.
snippet: Damian Lillard, who has started every Portland game since being drafted in 2012, is slated to participate in multiple All-Star events and may be included on the United States national team.
